workExperienceDescr.desc1: After graduating highschool in 2015, I spent a year working at first as a cashier and then as an assistant floor manager at a wholesaler in Cape Town. I left that job at the end of the year due to the long work commute and started working in my area as private tutor. I continued that work until now as it is a flexible job that allows me to pursue my studies without being a dependant.
workExperienceDescr.desc2: During the 2 years I was studying civil engineering at Stellenbosch University, I had a partial bursary with SANZAF so in 2022 when they were looking for academic facilitators to tutor high schoolers as part of their community support programs, I offered my services for that year as I already had 4 years experience as a tutor.

softSkills.name: Leadership
softSkills.desc: I am good at taking charge of a task and ensuring that everyone is on the same page.

softSkills.name: Communication
softSkills.desc: I have well-developed communication skills since I'm very sociable and enjoy debating.

softSkills.name: Problem solving
softSkills.desc: I enjoy the process of grappling with a problem, as well as planning and trying out different solutions.
